import "../css/index.css" import unfav from "../images/unfav.svg" import house from "../images/house.svg" import { useState } from "react" const Unfavourite_item = ({ hotel, name, choosedDate, countOfDays }) => { const favImg = document.querySelector(".favoutite-hotels-list__fav") const favUnfav = () => { favImg.classList.toggle("favoutite-hotels-list__fav") console.log('kekius') } const [tripDays, setTripDays] = useState(" 1 день") switch (tripDays) { case 1: tripDays = countOfDays + "день" break; case 2: case 3: case 4: tripDays = countOfDays + "дня" break; case 5: case 6: case 7: case 8: case 9: case 10: tripDays = countOfDays + "дней" break; default: tripDays = "1 день" } return (
{name}
{choosedDate} - {tripDays}
Price:
23 924 ₽
) } export default Unfavourite_item;
